website_summaries.verdict: Though there are a few minor concerns about the handles and balls, you'd have a hard time finding a lower-priced set with better paddle design or performance.
pros: In addition to the rugged 5-ply blade design, these 4 paddles have well-made nips-out backings that deliver superior performance and don't seem prone to peeling like some costlier competitors
cons: Though the handles feel smooth, they have been known to develop occasional mild splintering
The set comes with 3 balls, but they are on the flimsy side

customer_reviews.title: Package was open, not new
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived completely opened, so it’s going to look bad as a gift. But since I have no time to get a new one, I’m stuck with it. Open box items should be sold as such and at a lower price, not passed along as new. Update. These are thin and light and not very substantial. The skin is also thin and has no thickness to it. They are cheap, even for the low price I’ll increase my rating only if I get a response and some discount for this.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Average paddles
customer_reviews.text: These ping pong paddles are sturdy and the pads seem to be securely attached. The downsides I see are that some of the paddles have rough handles- as if they weren't sanded well enough in the factory (so we had to sand them ourselves), and the handles also seem about 1/2 inch to an inch shorter than others we have played with, which has given a few of us blisters where the end of the handle dug into our hands after playing for an hour. Not bad, but not the best ever. Ping pong balls are standard and I have no complaints about those!
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: Very basic
customer_reviews.text: This is the kind of set you get for your kids who are barely starting to play table tennis. It's not going to last either way with the rubber part peeling away from the paddle. While it lasts, you can get some kind of spin with these paddles, but they just don't feel smooth.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: These are Stiga"s low end paddles.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set for my kids. On receipt it was obvious that STIGA had made these very inexpensive paddles to meet a low price point. At the time I ordered them they were only $12.35 for 4 paddles and 3 balls. As usual you get what you pay for (and inexpensively made set). I will suggest that you spend a little more and buy the better quality model STIGA Performance Table Tennis Set (ASIN: B00345XX5W). They are currently $29.99 for a set of 4 paddles and 6 balls. Stiga's customer service is second to none, if you have a problem they will make it right, and that is why I am giving them a 5-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Joaquin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to have some extra paddles for our ping pong table so that we could play 2-on-2. These paddles are a great addition to any game room ping pong table! Great value and quality! No issues!
customer_reviews.author: Trina D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the average game
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles and at a great price. They do the job and are sturdy. If you just need some paddles and balls to play some ping pong, get these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good quality balls too!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality balls! and ping pong paddles. Its been about a month and I use them every 1-2 days. Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Steve H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard bat paddles, great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money, but these are definitely "hard bat" paddles. I like a hard bat paddle, but could have used a little more pad on these paddles. Still, not a bad set to get back into the game after not having played since my college dorm days!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rupp

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a basic starter set. Paddles are cheap and not made well. Already peeling back on one of them and we only used it maybe 5-10 times total. Balls are okay but if you want good bounce, get better ones. Arrived with two out of three balls bent and unusable so I would probably not buy from this particular place again. Save the money and invest a bit more to get ones that do not fall apart so quick.
customer_reviews.author: Mel D.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this nice package
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this nice package! We love STIGA products - such good quality. We have a STIGA table and our family of 4 plays ping pong all the time. With kids ages 9 and 12, we know our table was the best investment ever and every Stiga product we buy is quality and a great use of our money. Thank you for helping us to have fun as a family!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Budnick

customer_reviews.title: Cheap paddles, does the job
customer_reviews.text: If you need cheap paddles these are perfect. The red and black covers on the paddles fall apart easily, they don't last long and neither do the handles. People have a tendency to bank the paddles on the table when playing no matter how many times you say "DONT DO THAT!". I've replaced these several times over and do not go for more expensive paddles because I believe the same thing will happen.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Windland

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for the Grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: The mini tennis table and racket set were a big hit with the grandkids over Thanksgiving, and it kept them all very happy in the basement. We even purchased additional rackets so no one would be left out. Our creative grandchildren even made up their own games paddling balls against the open basement wall. Hopefully, Christmas will be just as much fun for them. We have been very happy with our purchase, and the items arrived quickly, and in perfect condition. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: History Buffs

customer_reviews.title: That way our good paddles won't get ruined
customer_reviews.text: Of course these are not the professional paddles, but we put these out when the kids are having friends over. That way our good paddles won't get ruined. These work fine for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: I'm no pro, but...
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever review, but there's some things to know. Very low quality. Our office has this brand and they are beat up, so I thought I'd order some new ones for the guys on my team. The red and black part is not rubber like the ones at the office and might as well not be there at all. There's no cushion/grip to these for any spring/spinning. Just sayin... you get what you pay for with this.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for the grade school kids to protect the more expensive set. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: M. Choi

customer_reviews.title: ... posted here are from people that do not speak good English or are from another country
customer_reviews.text: it seems to me that half of the reviews that are posted here are from people that do not speak good English or are from another country , so that being said , this product is exactly what it says it is , it is a basic set that performs just like it says it does , it is perfect for beginners and family members and performs very well , so please do not DIS this product if you have not tried it , it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: lcb

customer_reviews.title: It may be good for outdoor commercial use at recreational public places but ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very basic racket, it doesn't have any padding on it. It may be good for outdoor commercial use at recreational public places but not at home. Yes, it is inexpensive and quality seems okay, but spend a little more and get a padded rackets.
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: It's like playing with a piece of wood
customer_reviews.text: A piece of junk, it's like playing with a piece of wood, super bad. for the same price better quality available a local Wal-mart
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: I love these paddles
customer_reviews.text: These are classic table tennis paddles similar to what I used when I was growing up. We've had them for 4 years without any issues and the only reason I am buying it again is I want to take this to the office
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great paddles! Exactly what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles! Exactly what you'd expect. We didn't use the balls because they don't bounce very well but they're so cheap anyway that it doesn't matter.
customer_reviews.author: SOS

customer_reviews.title: Best paddles ever
customer_reviews.text: These are like the Cadillac of... wait scratch that these are like the Ferrari of paddles. The speed and spin you can get with these bad boys will dazzle even a pro table tennis players. The grip fits in your hand like a perfectly ripe banana and I am not talking about one of those spotted smelly bananas. I am taking a banana that makes the color yellow look good . Overall I think you will be pleased with these paddles!!!
customer_reviews.author: James Branch

customer_reviews.title: Nice set and was exactly what i was looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and was exactly what i was looking for for this price.... don't expect anything great with these but for just goofing around on the pong table back by our pool these are great. I did end up taping the handles as i didnt like the wooden feel but so far these are holding up nicely and def. better than local dept. store prices.
customer_reviews.author: A Cafass

customer_reviews.title: So far okay
customer_reviews.text: So far...okay. The table tennis paddle fits well in my hand and we had fun playing with the set although the 1-star ping pong balls are not very bouncy. While I appreciate having some free balls with the set, it's really annoying that they are not great quality. Do yourself a favor and buy the tournament quality 3-star balls along with these paddles.
customer_reviews.author: iloveemeralds

customer_reviews.title: You certainly aren't going to win the Olympics with one of these paddles but they are fine for casual play
customer_reviews.text: For the money I can't give these less than 5 stars. You certainly aren't going to win the Olympics with one of these paddles but they are fine for casual play. The included balls are terrible but the kids won't notice.
customer_reviews.author: SW Engineer

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: it's like playing with a piece of wood. I don't know what's up with all these good reviews, if you think these Paddles are good, then .... I got nothing to say
customer_reviews.author: MKMR

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive set
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive set. The balls dent easily so we have to replace those already, but the paddles are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aces5

customer_reviews.title: Nice Idea...Poor Execution
customer_reviews.text: I thought that when I bought this set from Stiga, I would be getting a well-made product with a decent amount of quality. Now, I know that for the price this set seems like it can't be beat...that's why I bought it. However, after using it for about a week the rubber facings began to peel off and the "wood" started to separate. Now looking for something with better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set!
customer_reviews.text: We already smashed the 3 balls and ordered STIGA 3 star......which are unbelievable. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: douglas gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with a table we bought for fathers day, they are great quality much better than what came with the table!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kutz

customer_reviews.title: Thin paddles
customer_reviews.text: The paddles are thin. I was hoping they were the thick stuffed kind, but they are not. They are still OK though. Balls cracked rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Khokha2

customer_reviews.title: That was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Well I was expecting 4 paddles, since the picture shows 4 paddles. That was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: John Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for home use
customer_reviews.text: item was a stated and arrived quickly. quality was good and came with a few balls to get the game started.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these as a gift for a family member. Shipping was quick, the quality of the product was good, solid paddles for the price. Sometimes when you order things like these you can be surprised sometimes by the lack of quality, but these did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Webster #1553

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great paddle set
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price or quality of these ping pong paddles. We received a great portable net that can be used on various tables, but the collapsible paddles that came with the net aren't easy to play with. So we ordered these, and are very pleased. Prime shipping makes it all the more attractive.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ok quality good to replace originals and enough to keep teenager kids playing.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what we were looking for, an inexpensive and quality table tennis set. We have use them several times already and feel as though they are made well. It comes with a very old table tennis DVD that you may not want to watch unless you are really into competitive table tennis(kind of long and boring).
customer_reviews.author: M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but price is right
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for the most basic ping pong paddle on earth, you've found it. Offers no give and is pretty flimsy, but priced right to get 4 paddles, particularly if you buy yourself a good paddle and let your buddies struggle with these mini-frying pans. A home-court advantage buy for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mac1604

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for company break room. I fully expect ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for company break room. I fully expect them to last at least 6 months with daily use by several employees. Have used before and will use again
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat the value.
customer_reviews.text: I know many users have been unhappy with the quality. My challenge is that you're spending a whopping $4 per paddle. Were you really expecting to get a $50-level quality? These work perfectly well for their purpose, especially for use with younger children or novices.
customer_reviews.author: TWC

customer_reviews.title: too thin
customer_reviews.text: Children to participate in table tennis extra-curricular interest classes, bought this table tennis racket, but the coach said too thin, not suitable for use, and waste
customer_reviews.author: guoweijia

customer_reviews.title: does the job, has held up to childs play
customer_reviews.text: Good value for price, no one is a professional. lots of children have used them and they have still going fine after 5 months. No issues, padding has not come unglued as some report. They are as advertised, inexpensive Table Tennis Paddles
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Meets our needs
customer_reviews.text: Not sure there is much to say about these paddles as they are pretty standard, and they are exactly what we expected. We are new to the joy of table tennis, and find these rackets comfortable to hold. We also appreciate that the seller sent these paddles quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie Press

customer_reviews.title: Quality Paddles
customer_reviews.text: We are delighted with our new paddles. We didn't really need 4, but the price was right, and within a year of so we would have had to buy two more. For persons who are serious and play doubles, it only makes sense to replace all paddles at the same time, so each player has equivalent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Keith E. Zeff

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap and cheerful paddles. One of them is cracking a little after being dropped on the edge of the table and the rubber starts to peel pretty quickly. If you looked after them really careful they'd probably be okay. Not a very performance oriented paddle, but good enough for our Friday office tournament.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P. Brent

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little table tennis set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little table tennis set for the price. My son and I live in an apartment and we can go out anytime know and play with our own set instead of going to rental office. Would recommend for anyone just looking for a great time with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fader

customer_reviews.title: Practical, good rubber face...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and functional, but a little light for my taste. It's practical and does great for spins, etc, but was hoping for a little more handle to it, and a little more weight. Would purchase again, but can't say it "wowed" me. Good price. Glue on face seems very well administered and long lasting. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: JCLover

customer_reviews.title: If you like a hard paddle then you will like these paddles
customer_reviews.text: I took these paddles overseas for a ping pong tournament. If you like a hard paddle then you will like these paddles. They held up and remain in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: OK Table tennis set
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for and we didn't pay much, and as a result we're satisfied. In the first week some of the rubber surface was separating from the paddle but since then they've held up fine.
customer_reviews.author: S. Rude

customer_reviews.title: Great paddle set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these paddles to replace a previous set that had the rubber break/separate. Since I couldn't find cheap replacement rubbers, I decided to give these a try. I'm glad I did. They're basic paddles but sturdy and perfect for the recreational or young player.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Santiago

customer_reviews.title: This turns any table into table tennis!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! So far, it fits 4 different tables we've tried. We took it to a class party for 5th graders and they loved it! It is very fun and really does turn any table into a table tennis table.
customer_reviews.author: Orland Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good starter set
customer_reviews.text: These are a cheaper set of paddles and balls but great for a starter set when you don't need 4 expensive paddles. They paddles have the thin layer of rubber with nipples on it. There is no padding.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: decent quality
customer_reviews.text: The balls held up to decent abuse and the paddles did too, however after leaving them in a humid climate and not using them, the glue started to fail on 2 of them, but they were easily fixed so I shan't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: bad
customer_reviews.text: The rubber on the paddles started to come off. I tried to fix it with superglue, and they came off again. I wasn't looking for a pro paddle, just something that would work. These work until they break. I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Low cost basic set but very functional and work well
customer_reviews.text: Very basic set. You get what you pay for, nothing fancy about the handles or material, but they are functional. Update after many months - these have held up very well. They play fine, and happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RonnyT

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality of this set is horrible. Put some money on it and get a decent set
customer_reviews.author: YUSUF

customer_reviews.title: So can't recommend it. If you have a bunch of drunk ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok for the casual game, but I'm not a casual player. So can't recommend it. If you have a bunch of drunk friends playing in the garage while holding their cups of beer, then yes, this is plenty good. But if you're going to have a competitive game, definitely get something better. BUT, I purchased it exactly for the causal player that comes to visit, that way I don't have to lend them my good expensive racket. So it is performing as expected.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the racket set because the quality was not what I expected. If you don't play Ping pong regularly, this may be ok for you. But since I play ping pong on a regular basis, the design of the racket is not good enough. It only has one layer of material on the wooden structure, which means you can not do much when you hit the ball. By that I mean, it's hard for you to put some spin on the ball when you hit it. The surface of the racket feels very hard! I wanted it to feel softer.
customer_reviews.author: PetLover@LA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: No surprises with this purchase...quality exactly as described and maintained over holiday use.
customer_reviews.author: Myers family

customer_reviews.title: HUGE hit at my son's overnight camp. My son ...
customer_reviews.text: HUGE hit at my son's overnight camp. My son came home at the end of summer and said the paddles made his spin go faster.
customer_reviews.author: Ellycit

customer_reviews.title: Work Great
customer_reviews.text: Better than we expected. Thought we'd have to tear off the rubber coating, but didn't have to. They are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: RHB

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I saw a comment that these paddles were of poor quality. I completely disagree. They feel sturdy, look good, and were offered at a great price. I am very satisfied. Product arrived on time as expected in the condition stated. I will order them again. So far the kids haven't been able to break them.
customer_reviews.author: Miami33029

customer_reviews.title: For wood paddles they are fine, but the noise is just strange
customer_reviews.text: This is the most empty sounding paddle i have ever played with. So weird. For wood paddles they are fine, but the noise is just strange.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a Cub Scout Troop and didn't want to spend a lot of money. These fit the bill perfectly. Got 4 paddles and 3 balls for less than $15.
customer_reviews.author: PYV

customer_reviews.title: my Asian wife and I play ping pong with these ...
customer_reviews.text: my Asian wife and I play ping pong with these when we're not incorporating them into our lovemaking. the balls seem high quality, as do the ping pong balls included with this set.
customer_reviews.author: DocJ

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Cheap paddles that were cheap. Rubber started pulling off after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Exodus

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Already had a set of these paddles, just needed more. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hope that paddles are not as cheap as the balls
customer_reviews.text: Paddles seem like they will last long enough to serve their purpose (replacing some old warn out plastic paddles at our local condo association game room) but d@mn if the balls didn't separate/break just bouncing them on hardwood floor in our kitchen, literally the day they arrived via UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Brady Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good set for kids and for leaving outside on the table, they work great for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality. Had to glue two of the rubber pieces back on but not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: KBeasley

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: This is not only a great deal but also this equipment is quality-made. The rubber coatings are thick enough to not peel off right away and you get a few ping pong balls in this set as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diva_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fine By Me
customer_reviews.text: You get four paddles -- no frills. These are perfect for me and my kids. I guess if you want to put spin on the ball and do trick moves that you'll need different paddles, but for the table we just got, these work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beowulf

customer_reviews.title: Not smooth as picture indicates
customer_reviews.text: These looked like they were smooth (without the little dots), but they weren't. They had the little dots on them and according to our students who play a lot of ping pong, they don't like the dots......they prefer the smooth ones.
customer_reviews.author: M Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Good for playingPing Pong!!
customer_reviews.text: decent paddles & balls but not like the old days when the wooden portion of the paddle was varnished! Price is right; less than the $24 at the local store!
customer_reviews.author: BobCatTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: We're retired but love to play ping pong!
customer_reviews.text: After getting a ping pong table with our credit card rewards we needed paddles and balls! We got these paddles and have been enjoying playing. Good exercise too, especially when we miss the ball.....which happens more than we like!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased and I'm sure the paddles will be ...
customer_reviews.text: These are OUTSTANDING paddles and the balls are top quality too. Glad I purchased and I'm sure the paddles will be long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inexpesnive, good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Not that great quality, but it was inexpensive, therefore, should have expected. Would buy again as spares for kids to use, but ratchet down your expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap paddles but they work and that's what you expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Di Re

customer_reviews.title: Your standard paddles
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy with these paddles but my old ones needed replacing because the rubber covering was coming off the old ones. We'll use them for now and look for something upgraded on the next go around
customer_reviews.author: Willie g

customer_reviews.title: Great Paddles
customer_reviews.text: Great paddles at a great price. I would've given more stars but the plastic package it came in was torn open probably by a box cutter. And this was a gift. So it looked like it was either used and returned or open already.
customer_reviews.author: Slade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Archer fans and table tennis alike
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Archer fans and table tennis alike. That's pretty much everything.
customer_reviews.author: Dell

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase these!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a new tennis table and this packet of 4 tennis rackets with 3 balls. The rubberized mat'l on the rackets (2 of 4) are already peeling after 3 days of use. Buy the more expensive ones instead or get a different brand. These are not worth ANY money.
customer_reviews.author: A K

customer_reviews.title: The weight and grip on this paddle are great - have been using it well over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: The weight and grip on this paddle are great - have been using it well over a year and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Wed645

customer_reviews.title: Ping pong rackets
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my brother and his 3 young boys. They are fine for the money. They take some abuse so no need to spend big money on paddles. Will wait to see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Wallywoo

customer_reviews.title: Great for your amateur players
customer_reviews.text: Great for your amateur players! We keep these in our desks at work and go down to play a couple times a week and much nicer than the office paddles that are falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Sheena M. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Beer Pong Champ
customer_reviews.text: Nice ping pong paddles. These are just the old school dotted rubber paddles we all grew up with. They are cheap and work well for kid play and beer pong. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: surface is very rough and hard
customer_reviews.text: Bat surface is very rough and hard. Noise is very annoying when you hit the ping pong ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a good, basic starter set
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, basic starter set. The rubber padding began to peel a bit fairly soon. But they do the job for us.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip G. Camp

customer_reviews.title: Not well made, but cheap and easy to glue
customer_reviews.text: Daughter dropped a paddle and half the handle came off. Nothing a couple clamps and a little wood glue couldn't sort.
customer_reviews.author: --Jeff--

customer_reviews.title: A step up
customer_reviews.text: These are good paddles, not great, but for the price it is a fair deal. The balls are low end, & play a bit slow, which is actually good if you are just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Rating of Racket set
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product. After finally putting the table together, we tried these out this past weekend and had a great time together. The paddles are well made and we are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Kinton

customer_reviews.title: But perfect for kids who are liable to break these sorts ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are cheap. But perfect for kids who are liable to break these sorts of things quickly.
customer_reviews.author: jb3710

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: These are well constructed. Pips are out, slightly. Remember: "Friendship first, competition second." -Chairman Mao.
customer_reviews.author: Randall-James: Skates

customer_reviews.title: Ok for what they are
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a bit better, but these are just very basic hard paddles for the kids to kill. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Reiman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for casual use
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a teen center game room, and they've been just fine. The price is right, and they've lasted 3 weeks, which is longer than average. They get used hard, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: MyRealReview

customer_reviews.title: good for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: good solid paddles for the price its totally worth, I am not sure if they are genuine stiga paddles but server the purpose as i am just a casual player, this might not suit a pro.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The balls breaks very easily. The bat only has one thin layer.
customer_reviews.author: David N Guo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it ~~ played with them yesterday ~~helped me win the game!
customer_reviews.author: Twin

customer_reviews.title: This product didn't hold up the way I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: The quality just isn't there with these paddles. I had to re glue all the rubber back on them because they came loose. Would not order this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It`s OK
customer_reviews.text: It`s OK, however they are nor very well made but I guess for the price they work!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: if you plan on playing regularly then skip these and go with a more expensive proper set in the $50-75 range. I use this set to let the kids play with.
customer_reviews.author: nzk

product_meta.title: STIGA Classic Table Tennis Set
product_meta.description: Start a match with this table tennis set from STIGA. The Classic 2 and 4 Player Sets are perfect for the beginner player that wants to challenge their friends to a recreational game of table tennis. This set offers classic, hardbat rackets and 1-star regulation size balls. STIGA Classic Sets are approved by USA Table Tennis (USATT) and are the perfect accessory starter kit for your STIGA Table Tennis Table.
feature_bullets: Recreational Quality Set for Family Play
Four Hardbat Rackets and Three 1-Star White Balls
Rackets- Straight Handle, 5-ply Blade, and Surface Pips Out
